Title: Series: The Amarna Letters
Description: Clay cuneiform tablet; letter from Yahtiru to the king (of Egypt); 39 lines; writing large and coarse; nearly complete.
Curator's comments: This object was moulded for casting by Mr Prescott between 2/2/65 and 6/5/65 (Objects to Lab, 6 May 1958-31 December 1970).
Bibliographic references: Knudtzon, J A 1915a / Die El-Amarna Tafeln (296)
Bezold 1892a / The El-Amarna Tablets in the British Museum (57)
Oppenheim A L 1967a / Letters from Mesopotamia (no. 69)
Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.175)
Sigrist M et al 2006a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, III
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
